channel.title: New Contributor Onboarding Guide :: DLT-META
channel.description: This document aims to provide complete information needed for anyone who would like to contribute to the dlt-meta project. Your contributions are vital to its success, whether youâ€™re fixing bugs, improving documentation, or adding new features. Steps Step 0 - Read the documentation Refer documentation wiki page here that will guide you to access different DLT-META resources like documentation, github repo, presentation etc. Read the getting started link here to understand pre-requisite , setup steps and configuration details.
